options.name: continuous-integration/buildbot/master.nix
options.desc: The buildmaster will listen on a TCP port of your choosing forconnections from workers. It can also use this port for connections fromremote Change Sources, status clients, and debug tools. This port shouldbe visible to the outside world, and you’ll need to tell your workeradmins about your choice. If put in (single) quotes, this can also beused as a connection string, as defined in the ConnectionStringsguide.
